data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Dazzling Blue (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infants ‘Dazzling Blue’ dresses the lifestyle silhouette in a black Primeknit upper, featuring a snug, form-fitting structure made with adidas’ advanced digital knitting technology. On the lateral side, a streak of royal blue is accompanied by signature SPLY-350 branding. A full-length Boost midsole, wrapped in a semi-translucent TPU cage, provides springy cushioning for little feet. Underfoot, a ribbed rubber outsole delivers grippy traction.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga Reflective (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infants ‘Beluga Reflective’ delivers a slightly modified version of the sneaker’s original 2016 colorway. Scaled down for little feet, the minimalist silhouette features breathable Primeknit construction in a predominantly grey finish, contrasted by a vibrant orange side stripe marked with SPLY-350 branding. This updated design integrates reflective fibers throughout the breathable knit build, adding a hi-vis element to the sock-like upper. A caged Boost midsole delivers lightweight cushioning with each step.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR MX Sand Grey (Infants)
data.colorway: MX Sand Grey/MX Sand Grey/MX Sand Grey
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘MX Sand Grey’ brings progressive slip-on style to little feet. A mostly tan finish, enlivened with swirling hits of brown, grey and coral, suffuses an injected EVA foam build made in part with harvested algae. Strategically placed vents in various shapes and sizes provide enhanced breathability, while a soft top layer on the footbed delivers immediate step-in comfort. Underfoot, a wavy traction pattern yields optimal grip.

data.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Amber Tint (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Kids ‘Amber Tint’ delivers a subdued colorway of the basketball-inspired silhouette. The upper combines grey semi-translucent mesh with a tonal suede toe cap and wavy synthetic overlays in a scattered blend of tan, bronze and black. The latter hue is repeated on the stretchy neoprene collar and tongue. A prominent heel counter wraps the back of the shoe and extends into the midsole, featuring full-length Boost cushioning wrapped in a TPU cage.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Vermillion (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘Vermillion’ presents a monochrome colorway of Kanye West’s sneaker-sandal hybrid. The sustainable foam build, made in part with harvested algae, features sculpted lines and a deep crimson finish. Ventilation ports throughout the vamp and side panels deliver breathable comfort, while a textured insole keeps the foot locked in place. The slip-on is underpinned by a contoured outsole equipped with a wavy traction pattern.

data.name: adidas Sport Shoe LEGO Light Pink (TD)
adidas Yeezy QNTM Onyx (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Onyx’ treats the lifestyle silhouette to a stealthy makeover made up of black and dark grey tones. They’re applied to an embroidered mono mesh upper with a synthetic suede overlay at the toe. Black neoprene is utilized on the mid-cut collar, while reflective synthetic paneling reinforces the heel. The sneaker sits atop a full-length Boost midsole, wrapped in a semi-translucent TPU cage and supported by a herringbone-traction rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Glow Green (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infants ‘Glow Green’ pairs an eye-catching one-note finish with a minimalist design built for comfort. A vivid shade of green is applied to the slip-on, crafted from injected EVA foam and equipped with a heel strap for an extra-secure fit. Debossed at the base of the plush footbed, adidas’ Three Stripes logo represents the only bit of exterior branding. The sandal rides on a sawtooth outsole that delivers both grippy traction and impact protection.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR MX Cream Clay (Infants)
data.colorway: MX Cream Clay/MX Cream Clay/MX Cream Clay
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘MX Cream Clay’ brings the futuristic slip-on to a new generation of Yeezy enthusiasts. The design features a cream-colored base with brushstroke-like splashes of brown and grey applied throughout the majority of the upper, which is built with a blend of lightweight EVA and ethically sourced algae. The unique silhouette is marked by flowing lines and a series of punched holes that allow for amphibious wear.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Enflame Orange (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infant ‘Enflame Orange’ dresses the minimalist slip-on in a bold citrus hue. The lightweight sandal is crafted from injected EVA foam and features a soft footbed marked with adidas’ three stripes logo, representing the only instance of exterior branding. An adjustable strap wraps around the heel for an extra-secure fit. Underfoot, a series of deep grooves are carved into the outsole, delivering a blend of impact protection and grippy traction.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Foam Runner Infants ‘Mineral Blue’ combines a simple one-note finish with a sculpted foam build. Free of exterior branding, the upper is designed with flowing lines and multiple ventilation ports throughout the vamp and side panels, offering reduced weight and enhanced breathability. Underfoot, a textured sockliner keeps the foot locked in place, while a wavy tread on the outsole similarly provides non-slip traction.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Pure (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infants ‘Pure’ delivers a secure fit, thanks to an EVA foam upper equipped with an adjustable strap that wraps around the back of the heel. The open-toed build is supported by a matching foam outsole with horizontal flex grooves that deliver a smooth ride and enhanced traction. A comfortable fit is provided by a cushy top layer on the footbed, stamped with adidas’ three-stripe logo under the heel.

data.name: adidas ZX 8000 Sean Wotherspoon Superearth (TD)
data.story: Designed in partnership with the Round Two co-founder, the Sean Wotherspoon x adidas ZX 8000 Toddler ‘Super Earth’ is taken from the ‘A-ZX Series,’ a sprawling 26-part release that celebrates the iconic ZX running franchise. The sneaker’s patchwork design draws inspiration from the diversity of the natural world, featuring a mix of plaid fabrics, woven textiles and embroidered florals. A decorative piece depicting Earth as an S-shaped cartoon character is overlaid atop the tongue. Underfoot, the rubber outsole features adidas’ signature Torsion bar for added stability.

data.name: adidas Sport Shoe LEGO Bright Cyan (TD)
adidas Sport Shoe LEGO Multi (TD)
data.story: Launching as part of a larger capsule collection with the iconic toy brand, the LEGO x adidas Sport Infant ‘Shock Blue’ delivers a versatile sneaker secured with hook-and-loop straps for easy on and off. Bold primary colors enliven the mesh upper, made with 50% recycled materials and zero virgin polyester. A molded yellow heel tab is designed to resemble the surface of a LEGO brick, thanks to a distinctive texture that’s repeated on a smaller scale throughout the green rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Frozen Blue (Infant)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Frozen Blue’ presents a vibrant colorway of Kanye West’s futuristic basketball-inspired sneaker, scaled down and simplified for little feet. No-tie laces secure an a layered knit jacquard upper, enlivened with flowing blue lines that extend from the synthetic suede toe cap to the black neoprene heel/collar. A seamless heel counter extends to the caged Boost midsole, supported by a herringbone-traction rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Hylte  (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Hylte’ dresses the sneaker’s re-engineered Primeknit upper in a complementary blend of tan and yellow hues, resulting in a subtle camo-like design that’s interrupted by a streak of neon green on the translucent monofilament window. The lightweight build is mounted on a full-length Boost midsole, encased in grey rubber and reinforced by a herringbone rubber outsole to provide reliable traction for little feet. The Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Hylte’ is a regional exclusive and only launched in North America and Latin America.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Onyx (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Onyx Non-Reflective’ showcases a camo-like design made up of black and dark brown fibers on the minimalist knit upper, secured with no-tie laces for easy on and off. The lightweight build is mostly unchanged from the men’s edition, featuring a post-dyed monofilament side stripe on the lateral side and a wrapped Boost midsole underfoot. A herringbone traction pattern on the gum rubber outsole provides optimal grip.

data.name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Safflower (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Infants ‘Safflower’ overlays a glow-in-the-dark RPU cage atop a monofilament engineered mesh upper that’s shot through with flowing yellow lines. A contrasting black bootie and matching laces offer a comfortable fit for little feet, while the PU encapsulated EVA midsole delivers lightweight cushioning with each step. Underfoot, the rubber outsole utilizes a classic herringbone traction pattern for optimal grip.

data.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Teal Blue (Infants)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Quantum Infants ‘Teal Blue’ features the same minimalist build utilized on the men’s release. The one-piece Primeknit upper combines a neutral grey base with black and teal accents, along with reflective silver threads that form wavy lines along the side panel. A two-tone heel cap provides more reflectivity while also cradling the back of the foot. A semi-translucent cage surrounding the full-length Boost midsole delivers a stable ride.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon (Infants)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infants ‘Carbon’ delivers an entirely neutral colorway of the minimalist sneaker, supported by a full-length Boost midsole encased in semi-translucent rubber. Up top, breathable Primeknit construction blends black, grey and tan yarns for a unique patchwork-like aesthetic. Details include black no-tie elastic laces and a post-dyed monofilament side stripe in a matching black finish.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Pepper (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infants ‘Pepper Non-Reflective’ delivers a subtle colorway of the minimalist lifestyle sneaker for little feet. The multi-toned Primeknit upper, featuring a camo-like pattern in light grey and beige hues, offers a snug, sock-like fit. Semi-translucent orange mesh is woven into the monofilament window, adding enhanced air flow and a flash of color. Soft cushioning arrives via a full-length Boost midsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Israfil (Infant)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infant ‘Israfil’ features the same build as its full-sized counterpart, highlighted by a patchwork-like upper crafted from breathable Primeknit. The contrasting blend of pale yellow and bluish grey yarns is enlivened by a pop of orange on the signature side stripe that runs through the sneaker’s lateral side panel. A full-length Boost midsole is reinforced by durable semi-translucent rubber on all sides.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Blue Oat (Infants)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Infant ‘Blue Oat Non-Reflective’ showcases a slip-on knit build with elastic lace closure for a snug fit. Orange and brown hues make up the camo-like design on the upper, accented with a contrasting royal blue streak on the translucent monofilament window. The minimalist sneaker rides on a full-length Boost midsole, encased in a semi-translucent tan rubber cage.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zyon (Infants)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infant ‘Zyon’ retains the same material build as its full-sized counterpart. The sock-like construction adds a mix of grey and brown fibers to create unique woven patterns on the Off-White Primeknit upper, while the signature post-dyed monofilament side stripe is rendered in a basic black. Semi-translucent rubber encases a full-length Boost midsole, good for responsive cushioning with each step.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Bone (Infant)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Infant ‘Bone’ utilizes a one-piece polyester upper secured with no-tie bungee laces, enabling convenient and easy on and off for little feet. The understated color scheme is enlivened with reflective silver accents, highlighted by 700 branding on the sneaker’s lateral side. A sculpted PU midsole in contrasting black houses a full-length Boost unit, visible through cut-outs in the rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy QNTM Barium (Infants)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Quantum Infant ‘Barium’ features a seamless build that combines a grey jacquard knit base overlaid with a translucent RPU cage on the side panels. Reflective detailing offers added visibility in low-light conditions, while a synthetic suede toe cap provides improved durability in a high-wear area. The sneaker rides on a Boost midsole enveloped in a semi-translucent TPU cage.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Black (Infant)
data.story: Following a limited February 2020 release exclusive to New York, London, and Tokyo, the adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN ‘Triple Black’ dropped in full family sizing roughly three months later, including this Infants edition for a new generation of Yeezy acolytes. The blacked-out sneaker features a polyester upper with reflective detailing, secured with no-tie bungee laces and supported by full-length drop-in Boost cushioning.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Phosphor (Infant)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Infant ‘Phosphor’ showcases an eye-catching hue on the sneaker’s one-piece polyester upper. The high-visibility finish is augmented with reflective silver accents, including the oversized ‘700’ plastered across the sneaker’s lateral side panel. Under the foot, responsive cushioning comes courtesy of a full-length Boost unit, encapsulated within a black PU midsole and herringbone rubber outsole.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Earth Brown (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slides Infants ‘Earth Brown’ applies a dull earth-tone finish to Kanye West’s lifestyle sandal. Built with lightweight EVA foam, the slip-on differs from its full-sized counterpart by adding a heel strap for a secure fit. Exaggerated flex grooves on the outsole deliver optimal traction and a cushioned ride. Branding is limited to adidas’ three-stripe logo on the footbed, equipped with a soft top layer for step-in comfort.

data.name: adidas U Path Run Triple Scarlet (TD)
adidas OZWEEGO Cloud White Sky Tint (TD)
adidas Stan Smith Cloud White Core Black (TD)
adidas U Path Run Triple Core Black (TD)
adidas U Path X Signal Coral (TD)
adidas Stan Smith Cloud White Lush Red (TD)
adidas U Path X Signal Green (TD)
adidas Stan Smith Cloud White Shiny Heel Patch (TD)
adidas Yeezy Boost 380 Mist (Infants)
data.story: The Yeezy Boost 380 Infant ‘Mist Non-Reflective’ is made for a new generation of Yeezy acolytes. The build is virtually identical to the sneaker’s full-sized counterpart, featuring a knit upper finished in a grey camo-like print. Tan laces are matched by a horizontal patch of color on the midfoot, which roughly aligns with perforated detailing for breathable comfort. The lightweight build rides on a full-length Boost midsole, encased in a semi-translucent rubber cage.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Desert Sage (Infant)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infant ‘Desert Sage’ applies a military-inspired color scheme to the minimalist lifestyle silhouette, highlighted by a bright pop of orange on a subtle green knit upper. Reflective thread is woven into the monofilament side stripe for added visibility in low-light conditions. Secured with traditional lace closure, the lightweight build rides on a Boost midsole, encased in semi-translucent green rubber.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Orange (Infant)
data.story: Made for little feet, the adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Infant ‘Orange’ showcases a vibrant finish on the minimalist polyester upper, accented with reflective 700 branding that dominates the sneaker’s lateral side panel. No-tie bungee laces deliver a snug fit, while a full-length drop-in Boost midsole offers lightweight and responsive cushioning. Underfoot, a grippy herringbone rubber outsole provides durable traction.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Desert Sand (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infant ‘Desert Sand’ brings a spartan aesthetic to little feet, highlighted by a monochromatic neutral finish on a lightweight EVA build. Unlike the sandal’s full-sized counterpart, this pair adds a hook-and-loop strap that wraps around the heel for a custom fit. Underfoot, the bold sawtooth outsole features deep flex grooves for improved impact absorption and traction.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Bone (Infants)
data.story: The Yeezy Slide Infant 'Bone' dropped in December 2019 as part of a Yeezy sandal collection made for the whole family. Finished in an understated and neutral hue, the miniature slip-on differs from its full-sized counterpart by adding an adjustable strap at the heel for an extra secure fit. The soft yet durable foam build rides atop a ripple outsole, good for added traction and comfort.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Slide Resin (Infants)
data.story: The adidas Yeezy Slide Infant ‘Resin’ combines a minimalist, futuristic design with lightweight comfort. A monochromatic olive green finish is applied to the slip-on silhouette, constructed from injected EVA foam and equipped with an adjustable heel strap that wraps around the back of the foot for an extra secure fit. Deep horizontal grooves are built into the outsole for enhanced cushioning and traction.

data.name: adidas Ozweego Core Black Solar Green (TD)
adidas Ultra Boost 2019 Toy Story 4 Woody (Toddler)
data.story: adidas partnered up with frequent collaborator Disney, colliding the worlds of sportswear and film, for a kids’ collection inspired by Toy Story 4, the fourth film in the series. Part of the June 2019 collection, the UltraBoost 19 Infant 'Woody' sneaker equips small feet with a flexible Primeknit upper, locked down by supportive overlays. The color scheme is inspired by the cowboy’s outfit, topped off with a Woody sockliner.

data.name: adidas Ultra Boost 2019 Toy Story Buzz Lightyear (Toddler)
data.story: Revamping kids’-sized versions of some the Three-Stripes brand’s top models that are inspired by Pixar’s popular Toy Story film series, adidas and Disney combined forces for a June 2019 collection. The Toy Story 4 x UltraBoost 19 Infant 'Buzz Lightyear' sneaker displays a colorway modeled after the space ranger, made with an adaptable Primeknit upper, a Boost sole and a cushioned Buzz sockliner.

data.name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Black (Infant) (Non-Reflective)
data.story: Released in June 2019, the Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Infant 'Black Non-Reflective' repackages the adult shoe for infant-sized feet. This edition skips the reflective aspects of the accompanying release, favoring a straight black Primeknit upper with the 350 V2's standard side stripe across the lateral. The shoe includes integrated lacing for a personalized fit and a heel loop. Below, adidas' revolutionary Boost cushioning is contained inside of a translucent TPU midsole.

data.name: adidas Superstar 360 Black White Gold Metallic (TD)
adidas Sport Shoe LEGO Shock Blue (TD)
